<form method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data" id="surveyForm">
    {% csrf_token %}
    
    <div style="padding-bottom: 100px;">
        {% for item in questions_data %}
            {% with q=item.question %}
            <div class="question-card" data-question-id="{{ q.id }}">
                <span class="question-label">
                    {{ forloop.counter }}. {{ q.label }}
                    {% if q.required %}<span class="required-badge">*</span>{% endif %}
                </span>

                {% if q.input_type == 'text' %}
                    <input type="text" name="q_{{ q.id }}" id="q_{{ q.id }}" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="CevabÄ±nÄ±zÄ± yazÄ±n..." data-required="{{ q.required }}">

                {% elif q.input_type == 'textarea' %}
                    <textarea name="q_{{ q.id }}" id="q_{{ q.id }}" rows="3" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="DetaylÄ± aÃ§Ä±klama..." data-required="{{ q.required }}"></textarea>

                {% elif q.input_type == 'number' %}
                    <input type="number" name="q_{{ q.id }}" id="q_{{ q.id }}" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="0" data-required="{{ q.required }}">

                {% elif q.input_type == 'photo' %}
                    <div class="camera-upload-btn w-100" onclick="openCameraInput('q_{{ q.id }}')">
                        <input type="file" name="q_{{ q.id }}" id="q_{{ q.id }}" accept="image/*" capture="environment" hidden data-required="{{ q.required }}" onchange="handleFileSelect(this)">
                        <div class="preview-area" id="preview_{{ q.id }}">
                            <i class="fas fa-camera fa-2x mb-2"></i><br>
                            <span>FotoÄŸraf Ã‡ek / YÃ¼kle</span>
                            <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">Tek fotoÄŸraf yÃ¼kleyin</small>
                        </div>
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary mt-2 d-none edit-btn" id="edit_btn_{{ q.id }}" onclick="retakePhoto(event, 'q_{{ q.id }}')">
                            <i class="fas fa-pen"></i> DÃ¼zenle / Tekrar Ã‡ek
                        </button>
                    </div>

                {% elif q.input_type == 'select' %}
                    <div class="custom-radio-group" data-parent-id="{{ q.id }}">
                        {% for opt in item.options %}
                        <label class="custom-radio-option">
                            <input type="radio" name="q_{{ q.id }}" id="q_{{ q.id }}_{{ opt.id }}" value="{{ opt.text }}" onchange="handleParentAnswerChange({{ q.id }}, '{{ opt.text }}')" data-required="{{ q.required }}">
                            <span class="radio-label">{{ opt.text }}</span>
                        </label>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </div>
                {% endif %}
                
                <!-- ALT SORULAR -->
                {% if item.child_questions %}
                    {% for child in item.child_questions %}
                    <div class="child-question-card" 
                         data-parent-id="{{ child.parent_id }}" 
                         data-trigger-value="{{ child.trigger_answer }}"
                         id="child_{{ child.id }}">
                        <span class="question-label" style="font-size: 14px;">
                            {{ child.label }}
                            {% if child.required %}<span class="required-badge">*</span>{% endif %}
                        </span>

                        {% if child.input_type == 'text' %}
                            <input type="text" name="q_{{ child.id }}" id="q_{{ child.id }}" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="CevabÄ±nÄ±zÄ± yazÄ±n..." data-required="{{ child.required }}">

                        {% elif child.input_type == 'textarea' %}
                            <textarea name="q_{{ child.id }}" id="q_{{ child.id }}" rows="3" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="DetaylÄ± aÃ§Ä±klama..." data-required="{{ child.required }}"></textarea>

                        {% elif child.input_type == 'number' %}
                            <input type="number" name="q_{{ child.id }}" id="q_{{ child.id }}" class="form-control-mobile" placeholder="0" data-required="{{ child.required }}">

                        {% elif child.input_type == 'photo' %}
                            <div class="camera-upload-btn w-100" onclick="openCameraInput('q_{{ child.id }}')">
                                <input type="file" name="q_{{ child.id }}" id="q_{{ child.id }}" accept="image/*" capture="environment" hidden data-required="{{ child.required }}" onchange="handleFileSelect(this)">
                                <div class="preview-area" id="preview_{{ child.id }}">
                                    <i class="fas fa-camera fa-2x mb-2"></i><br>
                                    <span>FotoÄŸraf Ã‡ek / YÃ¼kle</span>
                                    <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">Tek fotoÄŸraf yÃ¼kleyin</small>
                                </div>
                                <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary mt-2 d-none edit-btn" id="edit_btn_{{ child.id }}" onclick="retakePhoto(event, 'q_{{ child.id }}')">
                                    <i class="fas fa-pen"></i> DÃ¼zenle / Tekrar Ã‡ek
                                </button>
                            </div>

                        {% elif child.input_type == 'select' %}
                            <div class="custom-radio-group">
                                {% for opt in child.options %}
                                <label class="custom-radio-option">
                                    <input type="radio" name="q_{{ child.id }}" id="q_{{ child.id }}_{{ opt.id }}" value="{{ opt.text }}" data-required="{{ child.required }}">
                                    <span class="radio-label">{{ opt.text }}</span>
                                </label>
                                {% endfor %}
                            </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                {% endif %}
            </div>
            {% endwith %}
        {% endfor %}
    </div>

    <div class="fixed-bottom-action">
        <button type="submit" class="btn-start-visit bg-success" id="submitBtn">
            <i class="fas fa-check me-2"></i> Formu Kaydet
        </button>
    </div>
</form>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@11"></script>
<script>
    // Global file select handler - hem onchange hem de event listener iÃ§in
    function handleFileSelect(input) {
        console.log('handleFileSelect called for:', input.id);
        if (input && input.files && input.files.length > 0) {
            console.log('File selected:', input.files[0].name, input.files[0].type);
            previewImage(input);
        } else {
            console.log('No file selected');
        }
    }
    
    // Sayfa yÃ¼klendiÄŸinde tÃ¼m file input'larÄ±na event listener ekle
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        // TÃ¼m file input'larÄ±nÄ± bul ve event listener ekle
        document.querySelectorAll('input[type="file"][accept*="image"]').forEach(function(input) {
            // Change event listener ekle (fallback)
            input.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
                console.log('Change event listener triggered for:', this.id);
                handleFileSelect(this);
            });
            
            // Input event listener ekle (bazÄ± mobil tarayÄ±cÄ±lar iÃ§in)
            input.addEventListener('input', function(e) {
                console.log('Input event listener triggered for:', this.id);
                handleFileSelect(this);
            });
        });
    });
    
    // Gizli input'u aÃ§
    function openCameraInput(inputId) {
        const fileInput = document.getElementById(inputId);
        if (fileInput) {
            // Input'u tÄ±kla
            fileInput.click();
            
            // Mobil cihazlarda bazen change event gecikebilir, kÄ±sa bir sÃ¼re sonra kontrol et
            setTimeout(function() {
                if (fileInput.files && fileInput.files.length > 0) {
                    console.log('File detected after click delay:', fileInput.id);
                    handleFileSelect(fileInput);
                }
            }, 500);
        }
    }
    
    // FotoÄŸraf Ã¶nizleme fonksiyonu (tek fotoÄŸraf)
    function previewImage(input) {
        console.log('previewImage called for:', input ? input.id : 'null');
        
        if (!input) {
            console.error('Input is null');
            return;
        }
        
        if (!input.files || input.files.length === 0) {
            console.log('No files selected');
            resetPreview(input);
            return;
        }

        const file = input.files[0];
        console.log('File info:', file.name, file.type, file.size);
        
        // Dosya tipi kontrolÃ¼
        if (!file.type || !file.type.startsWith('image/')) {
            console.warn('SeÃ§ilen dosya bir resim deÄŸil:', file.type);
            resetPreview(input);
            return;
        }

        // Preview area ve edit button'u bul
        const inputId = input.id;
        const previewAreaId = 'preview_' + inputId.replace('q_', '');
        const editBtnId = 'edit_btn_' + inputId.replace('q_', '');
        
        let previewArea = document.getElementById(previewAreaId);
        let editBtn = document.getElementById(editBtnId);
        
        // EÄŸer ID ile bulamazsak, parent element Ã¼zerinden bul
        if (!previewArea) {
            const cameraBtn = input.closest('.camera-upload-btn');
            if (cameraBtn) {
                previewArea = cameraBtn.querySelector('.preview-area');
                editBtn = cameraBtn.querySelector('.edit-btn');
            }
        }
        
        if (!previewArea) {
            console.error('Preview area bulunamadÄ± for input:', inputId);
            return;
        }

        console.log('Preview area found, rendering preview');

        // Ã–nizlemeyi gÃ¶ster
        const renderPreview = (src) => {
            previewArea.innerHTML = `
                <img src="${src}" alt="Ã–nizleme" style="max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid #0d6efd; object-fit: cover; display: block; margin: 0 auto;" />
                <div class="small text-muted mt-2 text-center">${file.name || 'FotoÄŸraf seÃ§ildi'}</div>
            `;
            
            if (editBtn) {
                editBtn.classList.remove('d-none');
            }
            
            // Camera button'un stilini gÃ¼ncelle
            const cameraBtn = input.closest('.camera-upload-btn');
            if (cameraBtn) {
                cameraBtn.style.borderColor = '#0d6efd';
                cameraBtn.style.background = '#f8f9fa';
            }
            
            // Input'a bir flag ekle ki form validation'da kullanÄ±labilsin
            input.setAttribute('data-has-file', 'true');
            
            console.log('Preview rendered successfully');
        };

        // FileReader ile Ã¶nizleme (mobil uyumluluk iÃ§in)
        if (typeof FileReader !== 'undefined') {
            const reader = new FileReader();
            
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                console.log('FileReader onload successful');
                renderPreview(e.target.result);
            };
            
            reader.onerror = function(err) {
                console.error('FileReader error:', err);
                // FileReader baÅŸarÄ±sÄ±z olursa object URL kullan
                try {
                    if (typeof URL !== 'undefined' && URL.createObjectURL) {
                        const objectUrl = URL.createObjectURL(file);
                        console.log('Using ObjectURL as fallback');
                        renderPreview(objectUrl);
                        input._objectUrl = objectUrl;
                    } else {
                        console.error('FileReader ve URL.createObjectURL desteklenmiyor');
                        previewArea.innerHTML = `
                            <i class="fas fa-check-circle fa-2x mb-2 text-success"></i><br>
                            <span>FotoÄŸraf seÃ§ildi</span><br>
                            <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">${file.name || 'Dosya'}</small>
                        `;
                        if (editBtn) editBtn.classList.remove('d-none');
                        input.setAttribute('data-has-file', 'true');
                    }
                } catch (err) {
                    console.error('Ã–nizleme oluÅŸturulamadÄ±:', err);
                    previewArea.innerHTML = `
                        <i class="fas fa-check-circle fa-2x mb-2 text-success"></i><br>
                        <span>FotoÄŸraf seÃ§ildi</span><br>
                        <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">${file.name || 'Dosya'}</small>
                    `;
                    if (editBtn) editBtn.classList.remove('d-none');
                    input.setAttribute('data-has-file', 'true');
                }
            };
            
            console.log('Starting FileReader.readAsDataURL');
            reader.readAsDataURL(file);
        } else {
            // FileReader yoksa object URL kullan
            console.log('FileReader not available, using ObjectURL');
            try {
                if (typeof URL !== 'undefined' && URL.createObjectURL) {
                    const objectUrl = URL.createObjectURL(file);
                    renderPreview(objectUrl);
                    input._objectUrl = objectUrl;
                } else {
                    previewArea.innerHTML = `
                        <i class="fas fa-check-circle fa-2x mb-2 text-success"></i><br>
                        <span>FotoÄŸraf seÃ§ildi</span><br>
                        <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">${file.name || 'Dosya'}</small>
                    `;
                    if (editBtn) editBtn.classList.remove('d-none');
                    input.setAttribute('data-has-file', 'true');
                }
            } catch (err) {
                console.error('Ã–nizleme oluÅŸturulamadÄ±:', err);
                previewArea.innerHTML = `
                    <i class="fas fa-check-circle fa-2x mb-2 text-success"></i><br>
                    <span>FotoÄŸraf seÃ§ildi</span><br>
                    <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">${file.name || 'Dosya'}</small>
                `;
                if (editBtn) editBtn.classList.remove('d-none');
                input.setAttribute('data-has-file', 'true');
            }
        }
    }
    
    // FotoÄŸrafÄ± yeniden Ã§ek (input'u temizle ve aÃ§)
    function retakePhoto(event, inputId) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        const fileInput = document.getElementById(inputId);
        if (fileInput) {
            fileInput.value = '';
            resetPreview(fileInput);
            fileInput.click();
        }
    }
    
    function resetPreview(input) {
        if (!input) return;
        
        console.log('resetPreview called for:', input.id);
        
        // Object URL varsa temizle
        if (input._objectUrl && typeof URL !== 'undefined' && URL.revokeObjectURL) {
            try {
                URL.revokeObjectURL(input._objectUrl);
            } catch (e) {
                console.warn('Object URL temizlenemedi:', e);
            }
            input._objectUrl = null;
        }
        
        // Data attribute'u temizle
        input.removeAttribute('data-has-file');
        
        const inputId = input.id;
        const previewAreaId = 'preview_' + inputId.replace('q_', '');
        const editBtnId = 'edit_btn_' + inputId.replace('q_', '');
        
        let previewArea = document.getElementById(previewAreaId);
        let editBtn = document.getElementById(editBtnId);
        
        // EÄŸer ID ile bulamazsak, parent element Ã¼zerinden bul
        if (!previewArea) {
            const cameraBtn = input.closest('.camera-upload-btn');
            if (cameraBtn) {
                previewArea = cameraBtn.querySelector('.preview-area');
                editBtn = cameraBtn.querySelector('.edit-btn');
            }
        }
        
        if (previewArea) {
            previewArea.innerHTML = `
                <i class="fas fa-camera fa-2x mb-2"></i><br>
                <span>FotoÄŸraf Ã‡ek / YÃ¼kle</span>
                <small class="d-block mt-1 text-muted">Tek fotoÄŸraf yÃ¼kleyin</small>
            `;
        }
        if (editBtn) {
            editBtn.classList.add('d-none');
        }
        
        // Camera button stilini sÄ±fÄ±rla
        const cameraBtn = input.closest('.camera-upload-btn');
        if (cameraBtn) {
            cameraBtn.style.borderColor = '';
            cameraBtn.style.background = '';
        }
    }

    // Ana soru cevabÄ± deÄŸiÅŸtiÄŸinde alt sorularÄ± gÃ¶ster/gizle
    function handleParentAnswerChange(parentId, selectedValue) {
        // Bu parent'a baÄŸlÄ± tÃ¼m alt sorularÄ± bul
        document.querySelectorAll(`.child-question-card[data-parent-id="${parentId}"]`).forEach(childCard => {
            let triggerValue = childCard.getAttribute('data-trigger-value');
            if (selectedValue === triggerValue) {
                childCard.classList.add('show');
            } else {
                childCard.classList.remove('show');
                // Alt soru gizlenince cevabÄ±nÄ± temizle
                childCard.querySelectorAll('input, textarea').forEach(input => {
                    if (input.type === 'file') {
                        input.value = '';
                        resetPreview(input);
                    } else if (input.type === 'radio') {
                        input.checked = false;
                    } else {
                        input.value = '';
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    }

    // Form gÃ¶nderilmeden Ã¶nce zorunlu sorularÄ± kontrol et
    document.getElementById('surveyForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        
        let missingRequired = [];
        let allInputs = document.querySelectorAll('[data-required="True"]');
        
        allInputs.forEach(input => {
            let questionCard = input.closest('.question-card, .child-question-card');
            // EÄŸer alt soru ise ve gizliyse kontrol etme
            if (questionCard && questionCard.classList.contains('child-question-card') && !questionCard.classList.contains('show')) {
                return;
            }
            
            let isFilled = false;
            
            if (input.type === 'radio') {
                // Radio button grubunu kontrol et
                let radioGroup = document.querySelectorAll(`input[name="${input.name}"]`);
                isFilled = Array.from(radioGroup).some(radio => radio.checked);
            } else if (input.type === 'file') {
                // File input kontrolÃ¼ - dosya seÃ§ilmiÅŸ mi?
                isFilled = (input.files && input.files.length > 0) || input.getAttribute('data-has-file') === 'true';
                // EÄŸer hala dolu deÄŸilse, Ã¶nizleme alanÄ±nÄ± kontrol et (fallback)
                if (!isFilled) {
                    const cameraBtn = input.closest('.camera-upload-btn');
                    if (cameraBtn) {
                        const previewImg = cameraBtn.querySelector('.preview-area img');
                        // EÄŸer Ã¶nizleme gÃ¶rseli varsa, dosya seÃ§ilmiÅŸ demektir
                        isFilled = previewImg !== null;
                    }
                }
            } else {
                isFilled = input.value && input.value.trim() !== '';
            }
            
            if (!isFilled) {
                let questionLabel = questionCard ? questionCard.querySelector('.question-label') : null;
                let questionText = questionLabel ? questionLabel.textContent.trim() : 'Soru';
                missingRequired.push(questionText);
            }
        });
        
        if (missingRequired.length > 0) {
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'warning',
                title: 'Eksik Zorunlu Sorular',
                html: 'LÃ¼tfen aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki zorunlu sorularÄ± doldurun:<br><br>' + 
                      missingRequired.map(q => `â€¢ ${q}`).join('<br>'),
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            });
            return false;
        }
        
        // Form gÃ¶nderilmeden Ã¶nce object URL'leri temizle
        document.querySelectorAll('input[type="file"]').forEach(function(input) {
            if (input._objectUrl && typeof URL !== 'undefined' && URL.revokeObjectURL) {
                try {
                    URL.revokeObjectURL(input._objectUrl);
                } catch (e) {
                    // Hata durumunda devam et
                }
                input._objectUrl = null;
            }
        });
        
        // TÃ¼m kontroller geÃ§ildiyse formu gÃ¶nder
        this.submit();
    });
</script>

{% endblock %}


====================
DOSYA: templates\mobile\task_detail.html

{% extends 'base_mobile.html' %}

{% block content %}
<style> 
    /* Bu sayfada container padding olmasÄ±n, baÅŸlÄ±k tam otursun */
    .container { padding: 0 !important; max-width: 100%; } 
    /* Alt menÃ¼yÃ¼ bu sayfada gizleyelim ki Start butonu tam otursun */
    .bottom-nav { display: none; }
</style>

<div class="store-header">
    <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-start mb-2">
        <a href="{% url 'mobile_home' %}" class="text-dark" style="font-size: 18px; text-decoration: none;" onclick="return confirmGoBack(event)">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i>
        </a>
    </div>
    <h3 class="fw-bold text-dark m-0">{{ task.customer.name }}</h3>
    <p class="text-muted small mt-1">
        <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt text-danger me-1"></i>
        {% if task.customer.address and task.customer.address != 'nan' %}
            {{ task.customer.address }}
        {% else %}
            {{ task.customer.district|default:"" }} / {{ task.customer.city|default:"" }}
        {% endif %}
    </p>
    
    <a href="https://maps.google.com/?q={{ task.customer.latitude }},{{ task.customer.longitude }}" target="_blank" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary rounded-pill px-3">
        <i class="fas fa-location-arrow me-1"></i> Yol Tarifi
    </a>
</div>

<div class="survey-list-container">
    <h6 class="text-muted fw-bold ps-2 mb-3 small text-uppercase">ZÄ°YARET GÃ–REVLERÄ°</h6>

    {% for survey in surveys %}
<div class="survey-item disabled-survey" data-url="{% url 'mobile_fill_survey' task.id survey.id %}">
    <div class="survey-icon">
        <i class="fas fa-clipboard-list"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="flex-grow-1">
        <h6 class="m-0 fw-bold text-dark">{{ survey.title }}</h6>
        <small class="text-muted" style="font-size: 11px;">Zorunlu Anket</small>
    </div>
    <div class="lock-icon-area">
        <i class="fas fa-lock text-secondary opacity-25"></i>
    </div>
</div>
    {% empty %}
    <div class="text-center py-4 text-muted small">
        Bu ziyaret iÃ§in Ã¶zel bir form tanÄ±mlanmamÄ±ÅŸ.
    </div>
    {% endfor %}
</div>

<div class="fixed-bottom-action">
    <form method="post" action="#"> {% csrf_token %}
        <button type="button" class="btn-start-visit" onclick="startVisit()">
            <i class="fas fa-play me-2"></i> Ziyareti BaÅŸlat
        </button>
    </form>
</div>

<script>
    // Deneme sayacÄ± - sÃ¼rekli dÃ¶ngÃ¼yÃ¼ Ã¶nlemek iÃ§in
    let locationAttemptCount = 0;
    const maxLocationAttempts = 2; // Maksimum 2 deneme
    
    // 1. Ziyareti BaÅŸlatma Ä°steÄŸi
    function startVisit() {
        // Ã–nce mesafe kuralÄ± aÃ§Ä±k mÄ± kontrol et
        fetch('/api/get-distance-rule/')
            .then(response => response.json())
            .then(ruleData => {
                const distanceRuleEnabled = ruleData.distance_rule === true || ruleData.distance_rule === 'True';

                // Mesafe kuralÄ± kapalÄ±ysa: konum gerekmeden direkt baÅŸlat
                if (!distanceRuleEnabled) {
                    Swal.fire({
                        title: 'Ziyaret BaÅŸlatÄ±lÄ±yor',
                        html: 'Mesafe kuralÄ± kapalÄ± olduÄŸu iÃ§in konum doÄŸrulamasÄ± yapÄ±lmadan baÅŸlatÄ±lacak.',
                        timer: 800,
                        showConfirmButton: false,
                        didOpen: () => { Swal.showLoading(); }
                    });
                    sendLocationToServerWithFallback();
                    return;
                }

                // Mesafe kuralÄ± aÃ§Ä±k: eski akÄ±ÅŸ (konum zorunlu)
                if (locationAttemptCount >= maxLocationAttempts) {
                    Swal.fire({
                        icon: 'warning',
                        title: 'Konum AlÄ±namadÄ±',
                        html: 'Konum alÄ±namadÄ± ancak ziyareti baÅŸlatmaya devam edebilirsiniz. Ziyaret sÄ±rasÄ±nda konum gerekli olacaktÄ±r.<br><br><small>GPS\'in aÃ§Ä±k olduÄŸundan ve aÃ§Ä±k alanda olduÄŸunuzdan emin olun.</small>',
                        confirmButtonText: 'Devam Et',
                        showCancelButton: true,
                        cancelButtonText: 'Ä°ptal'
                    }).then((result) => {
                        if (result.isConfirmed) {
                            sendLocationToServerWithFallback();
                        }
                    });
                    return;
                }

                locationAttemptCount++;
                console.log('startVisit fonksiyonu Ã§aÄŸrÄ±ldÄ±, deneme:', locationAttemptCount);
                
                Swal.fire({
                    title: 'Konum AlÄ±nÄ±yor...',
                    html: 'LÃ¼tfen bekleyin, GPS verisi doÄŸrulanÄ±yor.',
                    allowOutsideClick: false,
                    didOpen: () => { Swal.showLoading(); }
                });

                if (navigator.geolocation) {
                    console.log('Geolocation API mevcut, konum isteniyor...');
                    // Ã–nce cache'lenmiÅŸ konumu hÄ±zlÄ±ca al (eÄŸer varsa)
                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(
                        function(position) {
                            // BaÅŸarÄ±lÄ± - sayacÄ± sÄ±fÄ±rla
                            locationAttemptCount = 0;
                            sendLocationToServer(position);
                        }, 
                        function(error) {
                            // Ä°lk denemede hata - cache yoksa veya timeout olduysa, daha uzun sÃ¼re bekle
                            if (error.code === error.TIMEOUT && locationAttemptCount < maxLocationAttempts) {
                                console.log('Ä°lk deneme timeout, daha uzun sÃ¼re bekleniyor...');
                                // Ä°kinci deneme - daha uzun timeout ile
                                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(
                                    function(position) {
                                        locationAttemptCount = 0;
                                        sendLocationToServer(position);
                                    },
                                    function(error2) {
                                        // Ä°kinci deneme de baÅŸarÄ±sÄ±z
                                        showError(error2);
                                    },
                                    {
                                        enableHighAccuracy: false, // HÄ±zlÄ± sonuÃ§ iÃ§in false
                                        timeout: 8000, // 8 saniye
                                        maximumAge: 600000 // 10 dakika Ã¶nceki cache'i kabul et
                                    }
                                );
                            } else {
                                showError(error);
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            enableHighAccuracy: false, // HÄ±zlÄ± sonuÃ§ iÃ§in false (GPS yerine WiFi/hÃ¼cresel kullanÄ±r)
                            timeout: 5000, // 5 saniye - hÄ±zlÄ± timeout
                            maximumAge: 600000 // 10 dakika Ã¶nceki cache'lenmiÅŸ konumu kabul et (daha uzun sÃ¼re)
                        }
                    );
                } else {
                    console.error('Geolocation API desteklenmiyor');
                    Swal.fire({
                        icon: 'error',
                        title: 'Hata',
                        text: 'TarayÄ±cÄ±nÄ±z konum servisini desteklemiyor.',
                        confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
                    });
                }
            })
            .catch(() => {
                // Kural okunamazsa varsayÄ±lan: mesafe kuralÄ± aÃ§Ä±k kabul et ve mevcut akÄ±ÅŸ
                locationAttemptCount++;
                Swal.fire({
                    title: 'Konum AlÄ±nÄ±yor...',
                    html: 'LÃ¼tfen bekleyin, GPS verisi doÄŸrulanÄ±yor.',
                    allowOutsideClick: false,
                    didOpen: () => { Swal.showLoading(); }
                });
                if (navigator.geolocation) {
                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(sendLocationToServer, showError, {
                        enableHighAccuracy: false,
                        timeout: 5000,
                        maximumAge: 600000
                    });
                } else {
                    Swal.fire({ icon: 'error', title: 'Hata', text: 'TarayÄ±cÄ±nÄ±z konum servisini desteklemiyor.' });
                }
            });
    }
    
    // Konum olmadan ziyareti baÅŸlat (fallback)
    function sendLocationToServerWithFallback() {
        const taskId = parseInt("{{ task.id }}", 10);
        const url = `/api/start-visit/${taskId}/`;
        
        // Konum olmadan gÃ¶nder (sunucu kontrol edecek)
        fetch(url, {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                'X-CSRFToken': csrftoken
            },
            body: JSON.stringify({ latitude: null, longitude: null }),
            credentials: 'same-origin'
        })
        .then(response => {
            if (!response.ok) {
                return response.text().then(text => {
                    throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${text}`);
                });
            }
            return response.text().then(text => {
                try {
                    return JSON.parse(text);
                } catch (e) {
                    throw new Error('Sunucudan geÃ§ersiz yanÄ±t alÄ±ndÄ±.');
                }
            });
        })
        .then(data => {
            if (data && data.success) {
                Swal.fire({
                    icon: 'success',
                    title: 'Ziyaret BaÅŸlatÄ±ldÄ±!',
                    text: data.message || 'Ziyaret baÅŸarÄ±yla baÅŸlatÄ±ldÄ±.',
                    timer: 1500,
                    showConfirmButton: false
                });
                updateUIForStartedVisit();
            } else {
                Swal.fire({
                    icon: 'error',
                    title: 'Hata',
                    text: data.message || 'Ziyaret baÅŸlatÄ±lamadÄ±.',
                    confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
                });
            }
        })
        .catch(error => {
            console.error('Fetch hatasÄ±:', error);
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'error',
                title: 'BaÄŸlantÄ± HatasÄ±',
                text: 'Sunucuya baÄŸlanÄ±lamadÄ±. LÃ¼tfen internet baÄŸlantÄ±nÄ±zÄ± kontrol edin.',
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            });
        });
    }

    // CSRF Token'Ä± al
    function getCookie(name) {
        let cookieValue = null;
        if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
            const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                    cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        return cookieValue;
    }
    
    const csrftoken = getCookie('csrftoken') || '{{ csrf_token }}';
    
    // 2. Sunucuya GÃ¶nderme
    function sendLocationToServer(position) {
        const lat = position.coords.latitude;
        const lng = position.coords.longitude;
        const taskId = parseInt("{{ task.id }}", 10);
        
        console.log('Konum alÄ±ndÄ±:', lat, lng);
        console.log('Task ID:', taskId);
        console.log('CSRF Token:', csrftoken ? 'Var' : 'Yok');

        const url = `/api/start-visit/${taskId}/`;
        console.log('Fetch URL:', url);
        console.log('Request body:', JSON.stringify({ latitude: lat, longitude: lng }));
        
        fetch(url, {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                'X-CSRFToken': csrftoken
            },
            body: JSON.stringify({ latitude: lat, longitude: lng }),
            credentials: 'same-origin'
        })
        .then(response => {
            console.log('Response status:', response.status);
            console.log('Response headers:', response.headers);
            
            // Response'un baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± olup olmadÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± kontrol et
            if (!response.ok) {
                return response.text().then(text => {
                    console.error('Response error text:', text);
                    throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${text}`);
                });
            }
            
            // JSON parse et
            return response.text().then(text => {
                console.log('Response text:', text);
                try {
                    return JSON.parse(text);
                } catch (e) {
                    console.error('JSON parse error:', e);
                    throw new Error('Sunucudan geÃ§ersiz yanÄ±t alÄ±ndÄ±.');
                }
            });
        })
        .then(data => {
            console.log('Response data:', data);
            
            if (!data) {
                throw new Error('Sunucudan yanÄ±t alÄ±namadÄ±.');
            }
            
            if (data.success) {
                // --- BAÅARILI OLURSA BURASI Ã‡ALIÅIR ---
                Swal.fire({
                    icon: 'success',
                    title: 'Ziyaret BaÅŸlatÄ±ldÄ±!',
                    text: data.message || 'Ziyaret baÅŸarÄ±yla baÅŸlatÄ±ldÄ±.',
                    timer: 1500,
                    showConfirmButton: false
                });
                
                // Kilitleri aÃ§an ve FORMLARI YÃœKLEYEN fonksiyonu Ã§aÄŸÄ±rÄ±yoruz
                updateUIForStartedVisit(); 
            } else {
                // --- BAÅARISIZ OLURSA (Konum HatasÄ±) ---
                Swal.fire({
                    icon: 'error',
                    title: 'Konum HatasÄ±',
                    text: data.message || 'Bilinmeyen bir hata oluÅŸtu.',
                    confirmButtonText: 'Tekrar Dene'
                });
            }
        })
        .catch(error => {
            console.error('Fetch hatasÄ±:', error);
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'error',
                title: 'BaÄŸlantÄ± HatasÄ±',
                text: 'Sunucuya baÄŸlanÄ±lamadÄ±. LÃ¼tfen internet baÄŸlantÄ±nÄ±zÄ± kontrol edin ve tekrar deneyin.',
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            });
        });
    }

    function showError(error) {
        let errorMessage = 'Konum alÄ±namadÄ±.';
        let showRetryButton = false;
        let showContinueButton = false;
        
        switch(error.code) {
            case error.PERMISSION_DENIED:
                errorMessage = 'Konum izni verilmedi. LÃ¼tfen izin verip tekrar deneyin.';
                break;
            case error.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
                errorMessage = 'Konum bilgisi alÄ±namadÄ±. LÃ¼tfen aÃ§Ä±k alanda tekrar deneyin.';
                showRetryButton = locationAttemptCount < maxLocationAttempts;
                showContinueButton = true;
                break;
            case error.TIMEOUT:
                errorMessage = 'Konum alÄ±nÄ±rken zaman aÅŸÄ±mÄ± oluÅŸtu. LÃ¼tfen tekrar deneyin.';
                showRetryButton = locationAttemptCount < maxLocationAttempts;
                showContinueButton = true;
                break;
            default:
                errorMessage = 'Konum alÄ±namadÄ±. LÃ¼tfen tekrar deneyin.';
                showRetryButton = locationAttemptCount < maxLocationAttempts;
                showContinueButton = true;
                break;
        }
        
        // EÄŸer maksimum deneme sayÄ±sÄ±na ulaÅŸÄ±ldÄ±ysa, sadece "Devam Et" gÃ¶ster
        if (locationAttemptCount >= maxLocationAttempts) {
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'warning',
                title: 'Konum AlÄ±namadÄ±',
                html: errorMessage + '<br><br>Konum olmadan ziyareti baÅŸlatmaya devam edebilirsiniz. Ziyaret sÄ±rasÄ±nda konum gerekli olacaktÄ±r.<br><br><small>GPS\'in aÃ§Ä±k olduÄŸundan ve aÃ§Ä±k alanda olduÄŸunuzdan emin olun.</small>',
                confirmButtonText: 'Devam Et',
                showCancelButton: true,
                cancelButtonText: 'Ä°ptal'
            }).then((result) => {
                if (result.isConfirmed) {
                    // Konum olmadan ziyareti baÅŸlat
                    sendLocationToServerWithFallback();
                }
            });
            return;
        }
        
        Swal.fire({
            icon: 'error',
            title: 'Konum HatasÄ±',
            text: errorMessage,
            confirmButtonText: showRetryButton ? 'Tekrar Dene' : (showContinueButton ? 'Devam Et' : 'Tamam'),
            showCancelButton: showContinueButton || showRetryButton,
            cancelButtonText: 'Ä°ptal'
        }).then((result) => {
            if (result.isConfirmed) {
                if (showRetryButton) {
                    // Tekrar deneme
                    startVisit();
                } else if (showContinueButton) {
                    // Konum olmadan devam et
                    sendLocationToServerWithFallback();
                }
            }
        });
    }

    // 3. ArayÃ¼zÃ¼ GÃ¼ncelleme ve FormlarÄ± Ã–nden YÃ¼kleme
    let visitStarted = false;
    let popStateHandler = null;
    let beforeUnloadHandler = null;
    
    function updateUIForStartedVisit() {
        visitStarted = true;
        
        // EÄŸer Ã¶nceki listener'lar varsa kaldÄ±r (duplicate Ã¶nleme)
        if (popStateHandler) {
            window.removeEventListener('popstate', popStateHandler);
        }
        if (beforeUnloadHandler) {
            window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', beforeUnloadHandler);
        }
        
        // Browser geri/ileri tuÅŸlarÄ±nÄ± engelle
        popStateHandler = function(event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            event.stopPropagation();
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'warning',
                title: 'Ziyaret Devam Ediyor',
                text: 'Ã–nce ziyareti tamamlayÄ±n. Ziyareti bitirmek iÃ§in "Ziyareti Bitir" butonuna basÄ±n.',
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            });
            // History'ye geri ekle
            window.history.pushState(null, null, window.location.href);
        };
        window.addEventListener('popstate', popStateHandler);
        
        // History state ekle
        window.history.pushState(null, null, window.location.href);
        
        // Sayfa kapatÄ±lÄ±rken uyarÄ± gÃ¶ster
        beforeUnloadHandler = function(event) {
            if (visitStarted) {
                const message = 'Ziyaret devam ediyor. Ã‡Ä±kmak istediÄŸinize emin misiniz? Ziyareti bitirmek iÃ§in "Ziyareti Bitir" butonuna basÄ±n.';
                event.preventDefault();
                event.returnValue = message;
                return message;
            }
        };
        window.addEventListener('beforeunload', beforeUnloadHandler);
        
        // Butonu deÄŸiÅŸtir
        let btn = document.querySelector('.btn-start-visit');
        if(btn){
            btn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-stop-circle me-2"></i> Ziyareti Bitir';
            btn.classList.add('btn-started');
            btn.setAttribute('onclick', 'finishVisit()');
        }
        
        // Kilit ikonlarÄ±nÄ± kaldÄ±r
        document.querySelectorAll('.lock-icon-area').forEach(el => {
            el.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-chevron-right text-primary"></i>';
        });

        // Formlara tÄ±klanabilir yap ve ARKA PLANDA YÃœKLE
        document.querySelectorAll('.survey-item').forEach(item => {
            item.style.opacity = '1';
            item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
            
            // TÄ±klama olayÄ±nÄ± ekle
            item.onclick = function() {
                let url = this.getAttribute('data-url');
                if(url) window.location.href = url;
            };

            // --- Ä°ÅTE O KOD BURADA OLMALI (BAÅARILI OLUNCA Ã‡ALIÅSIN) ---
            let url = item.getAttribute('data-url');
            if(url) {
                let preloadFrame = document.createElement('iframe');
                preloadFrame.style.display = 'none';
                preloadFrame.src = url;
                document.body.appendChild(preloadFrame);
            }
            // -----------------------------------------------------------
        });
        
        // GPS takibini baÅŸlat - KALDIRILDI (konum izni mesajÄ±nÄ± Ã¶nlemek iÃ§in)
        // startLocationTracking();
    }
    
    // GPS Takibi - Gezinme SÄ±nÄ±rÄ± KontrolÃ¼
    let locationWatchId = null;
    let warningShown = false;
    
    function startLocationTracking() {
        const taskId = parseInt("{{ task.id }}", 10);
        {% if task.customer.latitude and task.customer.longitude %}
        const customerLat = parseFloat({{ task.customer.latitude }});
        const customerLng = parseFloat({{ task.customer.longitude }});
        {% else %}
        const customerLat = 0;
        const customerLng = 0;
        {% endif %}
        
        if (!customerLat || !customerLng || customerLat === 0 || customerLng === 0) {
            console.log('MÃ¼ÅŸteri konumu yok, GPS takibi baÅŸlatÄ±lamadÄ±');
            return;
        }
        
        // Mesafe kuralÄ± kontrolÃ¼ - EÄŸer kapalÄ±ysa GPS takibi yapma
        fetch('/api/get-distance-rule/')
            .then(response => response.json())
            .then(ruleData => {
                const distanceRuleEnabled = ruleData.distance_rule === true || ruleData.distance_rule === 'True';
                
                if (!distanceRuleEnabled) {
                    console.log('Mesafe kuralÄ± kapalÄ±, GPS takibi baÅŸlatÄ±lmadÄ±');
                    return;
                }
                
                // Gezinme sÄ±nÄ±rÄ±nÄ± al
                return fetch('/api/get-wander-radius/');
            })
            .then(response => {
                if (!response) return; // Mesafe kuralÄ± kapalÄ±ysa response yok
                return response.json();
            })
            .then(data => {
                if (!data) return; // Mesafe kuralÄ± kapalÄ±ysa data yok
                
                const wanderRadius = parseFloat(data.wander_radius || 500);
                const warningThreshold = wanderRadius * 0.95; // %95'inde uyarÄ±
                
                if (navigator.geolocation) {
                    locationWatchId = navigator.geolocation.watchPosition(
                        (position) => {
                            const userLat = position.coords.latitude;
                            const userLng = position.coords.longitude;
                            const distance = calculateDistance(userLat, userLng, customerLat, customerLng);
                            
                            // UyarÄ± eÅŸiÄŸinde mi?
                            if (distance >= warningThreshold && distance < wanderRadius && !warningShown) {
                                warningShown = true;
                                Swal.fire({
                                    icon: 'warning',
                                    title: 'Dikkat!',
                                    text: `MaÄŸaza konumundan uzaklaÅŸÄ±yorsunuz. (${Math.round(distance)}m)`,
                                    confirmButtonText: 'Tamam',
                                    allowOutsideClick: false
                                }).then(() => {
                                    warningShown = false;
                                });
                            }
                            
                            // Gezinme sÄ±nÄ±rÄ±nÄ± aÅŸtÄ± mÄ±?
                            if (distance >= wanderRadius) {
                                // GPS takibini durdur
                                if (locationWatchId) {
                                    navigator.geolocation.clearWatch(locationWatchId);
                                    locationWatchId = null;
                                }
                                
                                Swal.fire({
                                    icon: 'warning',
                                    title: 'Mesafe AÅŸÄ±ldÄ±',
                                    html: `MaÄŸaza konumundan uzaklaÅŸtÄ±nÄ±z.<br>Mesafe: ${Math.round(distance)}m<br>Limit: ${wanderRadius}m<br><br>Ziyaret otomatik bitirilmedi. Devam etmek iÃ§in yeniden maÄŸazaya yaklaÅŸÄ±n veya manuel olarak "Ziyareti Bitir" butonuna basÄ±n.`,
                                    confirmButtonText: 'Tamam',
                                    allowOutsideClick: false
                                });
                            }
                        },
                        (error) => {
                            console.error('GPS hatasÄ±:', error);
                        },
                        {
                            enableHighAccuracy: true,
                            timeout: 10000,
                            maximumAge: 0
                        }
                    );
                }
            })
            .catch(error => {
                console.error('Gezinme sÄ±nÄ±rÄ± alÄ±namadÄ±:', error);
            });
    }
    
    // Mesafe hesaplama fonksiyonu (Haversine formÃ¼lÃ¼)
    function calculateDistance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2) {
        const R = 6371000; // DÃ¼nya yarÄ±Ã§apÄ± (metre)
        const dLat = (lat2 - lat1) * Math.PI / 180;
        const dLon = (lon2 - lon1) * Math.PI / 180;
        const a = Math.sin(dLat/2) * Math.sin(dLat/2) +
                  Math.cos(lat1 * Math.PI / 180) * Math.cos(lat2 * Math.PI / 180) *
                  Math.sin(dLon/2) * Math.sin(dLon/2);
        const c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1-a));
        return R * c; // Metre cinsinden mesafe
    }
    
    // Otomatik ziyaret bitirme
    function finishVisitAutomatically(taskId) {
        const taskIdInt = parseInt(taskId, 10);
        fetch(`/api/finish-visit/${taskIdInt}/`, {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                'X-CSRFToken': '{{ csrf_token }}'
            }
        })
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            if (data.success) {
                window.location.href = "{% url 'mobile_home' %}";
            }
        })
        .catch(error => {
            console.error('Ziyaret bitirilemedi:', error);
            window.location.href = "{% url 'mobile_home' %}";
        });
    }
    
    // Sayfa kapatÄ±lÄ±rken GPS takibini durdur
    window.addEventListener('beforeunload', function() {
        if (locationWatchId) {
            navigator.geolocation.clearWatch(locationWatchId);
        }
    });

    // Geri tuÅŸu kontrolÃ¼ (ana sayfaya dÃ¶nmeyi engelle)
    function confirmGoBack(event) {
        if (visitStarted) {
            event.preventDefault();
            event.stopPropagation();
            Swal.fire({
                icon: 'warning',
                title: 'Ziyaret Devam Ediyor',
                text: 'Ã–nce ziyareti tamamlayÄ±n. Ziyareti bitirmek iÃ§in "Ziyareti Bitir" butonuna basÄ±n.',
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            });
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    
    // Sayfa yÃ¼klendiÄŸinde ziyaret durumunu kontrol et
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const taskId = parseInt("{{ task.id }}", 10);
        
        // Ziyaret baÅŸlatÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸ mÄ± kontrol et
        fetch(`/api/check-visit-status/${taskId}/`, {
            method: 'GET',
            headers: {
                'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken') || '{{ csrf_token }}'
            }
        })
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            if (data.is_started) {
                visitStarted = true;
                // UI'Ä± gÃ¼ncelle
                updateUIForStartedVisit();
            }
        })
        .catch(error => {
            console.error('Ziyaret durumu kontrol edilemedi:', error);
        });
    });
    
    function finishVisit() {
        const taskId = parseInt("{{ task.id }}", 10);
        
        // Ã–nce zorunlu sorularÄ± kontrol et
        fetch(`/api/check-required-surveys/${taskId}/`, {
            method: 'GET',
            headers: {
                'X-CSRFToken': '{{ csrf_token }}'
            }
        })
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            if (data.missing_required && data.missing_required.length > 0) {
                // Eksik zorunlu sorular var
                let missingList = data.missing_required.map(s => `â€¢ ${s.title}`).join('<br>');
                Swal.fire({
                    icon: 'warning',
                    title: 'Eksik Zorunlu Anketler',
                    html: 'LÃ¼tfen aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki zorunlu anketleri tamamlayÄ±n:<br><br>' + missingList,
                    confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
                });
            } else {
                // TÃ¼m zorunlu sorular tamamlanmÄ±ÅŸ, ziyareti bitir
                Swal.fire({
                    title: 'Ziyareti Bitir?',
                    text: 'Ziyareti tamamlamak istediÄŸinize emin misiniz?',
                    icon: 'question',
                    showCancelButton: true,
                    confirmButtonText: 'Evet, Bitir',
                    cancelButtonText: 'Ä°ptal'
                }).then((result) => {
                    if (result.isConfirmed) {
                        // Ziyareti bitir
                        fetch(`/api/finish-visit/${taskId}/`, {
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                                'X-CSRFToken': '{{ csrf_token }}'
                            }
                        })
                        .then(response => response.json())
                        .then(data => {
                            if (data.success) {
                                visitStarted = false; // Ziyaret bitti, artÄ±k engelleme yapma
                                
                                // Event listener'larÄ± kaldÄ±r
                                if (popStateHandler) {
                                    window.removeEventListener('popstate', popStateHandler);
                                    popStateHandler = null;
                                }
                                if (beforeUnloadHandler) {
                                    window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', beforeUnloadHandler);
                                    beforeUnloadHandler = null;
                                }
                                
                                Swal.fire({
                                    icon: 'success',
                                    title: 'Ziyaret TamamlandÄ±!',
                                    timer: 1500,
                                    showConfirmButton: false
                                }).then(() => {
                                    window.location.href = "{% url 'mobile_home' %}";
                                });
                            } else {
                                Swal.fire('Hata', data.message || 'Ziyaret bitirilemedi.', 'error');
                            }
                        })
                        .catch(error => {
                            Swal.fire('Hata', 'Sunucu baÄŸlantÄ± hatasÄ±!', 'error');
                        });
                    }
                });
            }
        })
        .catch(error => {
            Swal.fire('Hata', 'Kontrol edilemedi!', 'error');
        });
    }
</script>

{% endblock %}

====================
DOSYA: templates\registration\login.html
====================
{% load static %}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="tr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
    <title>GiriÅŸ Yap | FieldOps</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;600;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
        /* GÄ°RÄ°Å EKRANI Ã–ZEL TASARIMI */
        body {
            background-color: #151521; /* Ã‡ok koyu lacivert/siyah */
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        /* Arka Plan SÃ¼slemesi (Flu IÅŸÄ±klar) */
        .bg-glow {
            position: absolute;
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            background: #0d6efd;
            filter: blur(150px);
            opacity: 0.2;
            border-radius: 50%;
            z-index: 0;
        }
        .glow-1 { top: -100px; left: -100px; }
        .glow-2 { bottom: -100px; right: -100px; background: #6610f2; }

        /* GiriÅŸ KartÄ± */
        .login-card {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 400px;
            padding: 40px 30px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            /* Cam Efekti (Glassmorphism) yok, temiz koyu kart */
            background: transparent; 
        }

<script>
    // Sayfa yÃ¼klendiÄŸinde Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        // EÄŸer ekran geniÅŸliÄŸi 768px'den kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼kse (Telefonsa)
        if (window.innerWidth < 768) {
            // Formu bul
            var form = document.querySelector('form');
            
            // EÄŸer URL'de zaten bir yÃ¶nlendirme yoksa
            if (!window.location.search.includes('next=')) {
                // Gizli bir input oluÅŸtur ve "next" parametresi olarak "/app/" gÃ¶nder
                var input = document.createElement('input');
                input.type = 'hidden';
                input.name = 'next';
                input.value = '/app/';
                form.appendChild(input);
            }
        }
    });
</script>
